title: Music sheets + awesomes musics â™¥
body:
Hello Riot Games, Riot Games music team. 
I love Your musics and I'm probably not the only one. Irelia's login screen is probably my favourite and I'm searching for a official music sheet of it. I know that no official music sheets has been reporter on the internet but I am still looking for some. I would really love if you can give free access to them but even if you wil probably don't do that, please at least sell them, make a full book of your sheets, sell them 100$, 200$ I'll buy it anyways. Love you and hope you will see this. And again I definitely love your work. Nice job.

replies.body:
Hello Iceclem! Thanks for the kind words & your timing is perfect. We actually just released a new article that features a bunch of new music sheets, one of which is {{champion:39}} theme! If you'd like to check it out, just visit this link & it's down near the bottom (just click the 'Irelia' tab).  https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2018/07/dev-forging-melodies/

Hope you enjoy! <3
And maybe I'm asking too much but cab we have the sheet, with all instrument?  I actually want to play it with my friends. Thank you really much again.
I love you so much, really thank you,  I love you.
Is there a chance of you guys releasing the music sheets for Burning bright star guardian? That song is so good and I'd love to learn it on piano...
